mapper.sql: park_id, park_no, park_car_no, owner_name as 'park_owner', emp_name as 'park_operator', park_comment
mapper.select:
select count(*) from parking
where owner_name like concat('%', #{parkOwner}, '%')

select
from parking, owner, manager where parking.park_owner = owner.owner_no and parking.park_operator = manager.emp_id
and owner_name like concat('%', #{parkOwner}, '%')
limit #{page}, #{limit}

select
from parking, owner, manager where parking.park_owner = owner.owner_no and parking.park_operator = manager.emp_id and park_id = #{parkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert:
insert into parking
park_id,
park_no,
park_car_no,
park_owner,
park_operator,
park_comment,
#{parkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parkNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{parkCarNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parkOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parkOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{parkComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update parking
park_no = #{parkNo,jdbcType=INTEGER},
park_car_no = #{parkCarNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
park_owner = #{parkOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
park_operator = #{parkOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
park_comment = #{parkComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where park_id = #{parkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update parking set park_no = #{parkNo,jdbcType=INTEGER}, park_car_no = #{parkCarNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, park_owner = #{parkOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, park_operator = #{parkOperator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, park_comment = #{parkComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where park_id = #{parkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
